name: Sub guerra
description:
Greetings to all, for those who do not know I am Alepiskel the creator of Sub guerra. We hope you like this demo.

If you like RPGs, play Sub guerra!!

This demo consists of an adventure of a young leader who wants to save the world from the clutches of Chaos, with your help and that of his allies. Facing great enemies in incredible battles... Let's go on an adventure Sub guerra.

Note: An apology to everyone.

If you see any errors or bugs, I will be working on them.

This project is a small glimpse of what is to come and is expected to be finished by October of next year.
